name: RUNME.exe
description:
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
What is RUNME.EXE?
RunMe is an esoteric turn based puzzle game with glitch graphics, weird sounds, and a bunch of strangeness. It's deliberately a bit opaque, you'll need to figure things out for yourself.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Who made this game?
This game originally started out as a little personal project "just for fun" that I was working on Solo. In 2018 my studio, roll7 decided to polish this little prototype into a demo that we could pitch to various publishers.

This version is the demo that we sent to publishers at the end of 2018. We had some interest, but we couldn't really get the project going and have subsequently moved on to other things.

It's unlikely that we'll ever get the time or capacity to do much more with this game (unless there's a stack of interest on here), so we thought it would be cool to just put it out and let people see where we got to.

"code",,Design -John Ribbins
QA, Additional Design -Sam Brayley
Playtesting and feedback-Simon Bennett, Tom Hegarty

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

How to Play

NEEDS A 3 BUTTON MOUSE.

Left Click initiates your current action, scroll to change actions.

There is no quit button :) Use ALT+F4 to close RunMe

Have fun!

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
